I would like to output/append the highest level summary data 
(#tests, #failures, #errors) to a spreadsheet (or file that can be 
accessed by spreadsheet) so that we can track spikes in 
errors/failures and correlate to other factors (e.g., trying to 
maintain an unrealistic velocity).

Does anyone know how to do this through the ant JUnit Report 
structure?
